channel.title: How are you preparing for the update?
channel.description:
How are you preparing for the wilderness and free trade update?
-Im botting several lvl 3 accounts and will continue to after it comes out and then I can trade over the cash to my main pures and main account.
-Also Im developing 3 good pures and my 1 maxed main -One pure is going to be a sick staker. Designed to win high risk stakes -another is a turmoil pure maxed with 60 attack, 30 defence -the last is a green dragon pker. Around 85-95cb and will be for killing pures and some higher lvls at areas like green dragons.

item.title: How are you preparing for the update?
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“Primadude, post:47, topic:379999”][quote author=X Entinity X link=topic=475845.msg3485090#msg3485090 date=1296491344]

8 hours for me to finish getting doing the fight caves and attempt to get a fighter’s torso :D.

I’m your teacher.

@topic- Bot it up.
[/quote]

Typo; was going to say ‘getting a firecape’, but then thought I’d put ‘doing the fight caves’ :P.[/quote]

I just got a f cape :). I will only use when pking with really good clans or not even then. Prolly never pking

Read full topic

item.title: How are you preparing for the update?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Making money for my pure and training it as well. Just two more days until the update.

Might just throw on a bot for this account since it has shit stats anyway, but as for now I am just gathering some money. I don’t have any idea on how to set up a bot though.

item.title: How are you preparing for the update?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:38, topic:379999”]Trying to remember all my passwords!
But seriously, I do have a large wealth spread over several accounts but I have clue what the passwords are to half of the them

I’ve also made a pure that I plan to get 40 attk, 60 str, 50 mage to pk at varrock with a couple of irl mates but I am nowhere near that so I clearly not prepared at all.

A question: Should I sell all my shit now since money is 9999 easy to aquire.[/quote]Depends, but keep your (single) items which are worth 1M or more because they will rise again to their ‘normal’ price.

Read full topic

item.title: How are you preparing for the update?
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Looks like I better start another account since I gave up one. I will have to bot the hell out of it, I find that being a little while, and some what time consuming. Other than that, I’m kind of excited about the update. We will have to wait five days for the update, so whatever. I might have enough of time for what I need to be done for the account.

Plus since I will not have membership for it, it’ll kind of be a bit harsh on me. I’ll find something to do for the account though.

Read full topic
